name: Baby Yellow and Grey Chevron All Fabric Soft Sole Shoes
description:
Finally, little shoes that will stay on your baby's feet! Gentle ankle elastic keeps them on their little toes without being too snug. Shoes are fully lined with super soft velour, perfect for wear with or without socks. A stylish way to keep your little ones feet cozy! Handmade in Bozeman, Montana

Each item is carefully hand-cut and sewn one at a time to ensure premium quality. Please expect up to two weeks for your item to be made especially for you. Please take the time to measure your child’s footprint to ensure the correct size is ordered for a perfect fit. Please understand due to the custom-made nature of the item, we cannot accept returns for incorrect sizing. 

These All fabric shoes are available in size Newborn, Small, and Medium ONLY. Please keep this in mind when ordering. 

Features:
- 100% cotton outer
- All Fabric Sole
- Cotton Velour
- Back pull tab of easy on and off
- Machine wash and dryable for easy care
- Totally animal free - Vegan

Size: Your Choice-PLEASE SPECIFY SIZE IN THE NOTES TO SELLER

Size Chart:

Size: NB
Shoe Size: 00 to 0
Appx Age: Newborn 
Child's Foot Length: To 9 cm or 3-5/8in
Shoe Length: 10 cm or 4in
Shoe Width: 5 cm or 2in

Size:Small
Shoe Size: 0 to 1
Appx. Age: 0-6 months 
Child's Foot Length: To 10 cm or 4in
Shoe Length: 11cm or 4-3/8in
Shoe Width: 5.5cm or 2-1/4in

Size: Medium
Shoe Size: 1-1/2 to 2-1/2 
Appx. Age: 6-12 months
Child's Foot Length: To 11cm or 4-3/8in
Shoe Length: 12 cm or 4-3/4in
Shoe Width: 6cm or 2-3/8in


To accurately measure your child's foot. Place a piece of paper on a firm flat surface (book, table, tile floor, etc). Have your child stand, or press their foot firmly onto the paper. Draw a line at the heal and the longest point of the toe. Measure the distance between the lines on the paper. Find the measurement on the "Child's Foot Length" column on the size chart to find the correct size. I recommend measuring in centimeters for better precision/accuracy. It' s very easy to misread the measurement in inches.

name: Zoo Shoes in Pink Non-Slip Soft Sole Baby and Toddler Shoes
description:
Perfect first walker shoes for your little one on the go. The unique grippy soles provide traction and stability your little one needs as they learn to walk with confidence. Scuff guards on the toes protect the shoe against scrapes and tears as they crawl. Shoes are fully lined, perfect for wear with or without socks. Gentle ankle elastic will keep shoes on the most active kickers and crawlers. Handmade in Bozeman, Montana

Each item is carefully hand-cut and sewn one at a time to ensure premium quality. Please expect up to two weeks for your item to be made especially for you. Please take the time to measure your child’s footprint to ensure the correct size is ordered for a perfect fit. Please understand due to the custom-made nature of the item, we cannot accept returns for incorrect sizing. 

Features:
- 100% cotton outer
- Scuff proof toe protects shoe from crawlers
- Slip proof rubberized sole - even on wet or icy surfaces
- Fully lined in soft cotton velour
- Back pull tab of easy on and off
- Machine wash and dry-able for easy care
- Totally animal free - Vegan

Size Chart:

Size:Small
Shoe Size: 0-1
Appx. Age: 0-6 months 
Child's Foot Length: To 10 cm or 4in
Shoe Length: 11cm or 4-3/8in
Shoe Width: 5.5cm or 2-1/4in

Size: Medium
Shoe Size: 1 ½-2 ½
Appx. Age: 6-12 months
Child's Foot Length: To 11cm or 4-3/8in
Shoe Length: 12 cm or 4-3/4in
Shoe Width: 6cm or 2-3/8in

Size: Large
Shoe Size: 2 ½-3 ½
Appx. Age: 12-18 months
Child's Foot Length: To 12 cm or 4-3/4in
Shoe Length: 13 cm or 5-1/8in
Shoe Width: 6.5cm or 2-1/2in

Size: XL
Shoe Size: 4-5
Appx. Age: 15-21 months
Child's Foot Length: To 13 cm or 5-1/8in
Shoe Length: 14 cm or 5-1/2in
Shoe Width: 7 cm or 2-3/4in

Size: XXL
Shoe Size: 5½-6
Appx. Age: 18-26 months
Child's Foot Length: To 14 cm or 5-1/2in
Shoe Length: 15 cm or 5-7/8in
Shoe Width: 7.25 cm or 2-7/8in

https://www.etsy.com/listing/158175987/make-that-non-slip-pair-bigger-in?

Draw a line at the heal and the longest point of the toe. Measure the distance between the lines on the paper. Find the measurement on the "Child's Foot Length" column on the size chart to find the correct size. I recommend measuring in centimeters for better precision/accuracy.
